Crossvalidation#

class spy4cast.spy4cast.Crossvalidation(dsy: spy4cast.spy4cast.preprocess.Preprocess, dsz: spy4cast.spy4cast.preprocess.Preprocess, nm: int, alpha: float, multiprocessed: bool = False)#

Bases: spy4cast._procedure._Procedure

Perform crossvalidation methodology

Parameters

  • y (Preprocess) – Predictor field

  • z (Preprocess) – Predictand field

  • nm (int) – Number of modes

  • alpha (float) – Significance coeficient

  • multiprocessed (bool) – Use multiprocessing for the methodology

zhat#

Hindcast of field to predict using crosvalidation

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

scf#

Squared covariance fraction of the mca for each mode

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

r_z_zhat_t#

Correlation between zhat and Z for each time (time series)

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

p_z_zhat_t#

P values of rt

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

r_z_zhat_s#

Correlation between time series (for each point) of zhat and z (map)

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

p_z_zhat_s#

P values of rr

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

r_uv#

Correlation score betweeen u and v for each mode

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

p_uv#

P value of ruv

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

us#

crosvalidated year on axis 2

Type

npt.NDArray[float32]

alpha#

Correlation factor

Type

float

Methods Documentation

classmethod load(prefix: str, dir: str = '.', *, dsz: Optional[spy4cast.spy4cast.preprocess.Preprocess] = None, dsy: Optional[spy4cast.spy4cast.preprocess.Preprocess] = None) → spy4cast.spy4cast.crossvalidation.Crossvalidation#
plot(flags: int = 0, dir: Optional[str] = None, name: Optional[str] = None, cmap: str = 'bwr') → None#
Plots:

  • r_z_zhat_s and p_z_zhat_s: Cartopy map of r and then hatches when p is <= alpha

  • r_z_zhat_t and p_z_zhat_t: Bar plot of r and then points when p is <= alpha

  • scf: Draw scf for all times for mode i. For the time being all in one plot

  • US

plot_zhat(year: int, flags: spy4cast.stypes.F = 0, dir: Optional[str] = None, name: Optional[str] = None, cmap: str = 'bwr') → None#
